title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Digging Into the Environment
description: Matthew Waite from St. Petersburg Times discussing the environment beat and how it involves large amounts of data, some of which is inaccurate or missing. He describes his work on Vanishing Wetlands and the importance of permitting databases, re-using data, and managing data.
